description: Native AWS tool for analyzing and visualizing AWS costs and usage over time. Supports filtering by service, linked account, tags, and provides forecasting capabilities.
Set custom budgets that alert you when costs or usage exceed or are forecasted to exceed your thresholds. Supports cost, usage, reservation, and savings plans budgets.
Multi-cloud cost management platform providing cost optimization, governance, and security insights across AWS, Azure, GCP, and data centers.
Real-time cost visibility and insights for Kubernetes workloads. Provides namespace, deployment, and pod-level cost allocation.
Cloud infrastructure optimization platform focusing on compute cost reduction through spot instances, reserved capacity, and rightsizing.
Cloud cost estimates for Terraform in pull requests. Shows cost impact of infrastructure changes before deployment.
ML-powered service that analyzes configuration and utilization metrics to recommend optimal AWS resources for workloads.
Modern cloud cost management platform with developer-friendly interface, Kubernetes cost allocation, and provider-agnostic approach.
